CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(mp_bc_available__c , 'AVAILABLE') , HYPERLINK( 'https://samrat-tad.cs112.force.com/TADMerchantPortal/s/report/00O0T000000JNJGUA4?reportFilters1=[{"column":"Deal__c.Order_Line_Items__r$ordexp_TAD_Order__c.ordexp_departure_date__c.Name","operator":"equals","value":"' & Name & '"}]' ,'AVAILABLE' , "_parent") , IF(ISPICKVAL(mp_bc_available__c , 'NOT AVAILABLE'),'NOT AVAILABLE','' ))
CustomField.label: BC Available
